captions.text: (Simon and Martina are going to...
(Upbeat OpenTheHappy Music)
Open The Happy!)
(Spudgy vs the Pickle) (It yodels and he hates it.) (Sound of a flute)
Ok, we've discovered this awesome, new toy for Spudgy.

This is the yodeling pickle, and our friend Jessica gave this 
 to us, and we were like, a yodeling pickle?

Maybe we can use it for like a Junsu skit 
 or something for Music Monday, but no.

Spudgy hates this pickle, and will do anything to find 
 it in the house. He goes like mad.

Ok, so I'm gonna go into another room and 
 yodel, and then you watch his reaction, okay?
[S] Ok. [M] I think he's on to us.
[Sp] Did I just see the pickle? (Dramatic Duh nuh)
(Yodeling begins) (Dramatic music begins)
[Sp] What?
(Yodeling and dramatic music continue) (Someone gasps)
(Dinosaur roar) [Sp] Nice pickle.
[M] Ok. Back pocket: pickle. [Sp] What? (More yodeling and dramatic music)

[Sp] I hate this pickle so much, guys. I hate the 
 pickle, do you know how much I hate it?
(Now Sexy "Intoxication" music) [M] Don't hump the pickle, Spudgy! (Laughs)
[S] Spudgy, don't hump the pickle! [M] Don't hump the pickle. (Both are laughing)
[M] Ok, we need to stop this madness.
(Goth Hello Kitty- Eyeshadow tutorial) or (Custom Shoes- Simon's Design!)
(Thanks for watching Open The Happy!) (Upbeat OpenTheHappy music)
